title: Mother and Child
credit_line: Gift of Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark. Sara M. Winokur and James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1979 [1].

Notes:
[1]. The woodcut was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. It was received at the museum on December 18, 1979. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1979 year-end gift was taken on February 7, 1980.
